alert.note: Alert for Jewell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 12:57PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Jewell County through 145 PM CDT... At 1257 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Randall, or 9 miles north of Beloit, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mankato, Jewell, Ionia and Randall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
